heroSection.heroLine1: Your digital presence should bring you clients.
heroSection.heroSubtitle: We design Landing Pages and Websites 100% focused on results. The ideal tool for businesses, SMEs, and professionals looking for real growth on the internet.

weDoSubtitle: We create digital experiences that make a difference
weDoWebSubtitle: We develop professional websites that establish and strengthen your digital presence.
weDoClientSubtitle: Each solution is custom-designed to meet the specific goals and objectives of your business.
weDoApproachSubtitle: We bring creative ideas and modern technologies to solve your digital challenges.
weDoText: We create websites for entrepreneurs and growing startups looking to boost their online presence, offering innovative solutions aimed at meeting each client's main objective.
weDoCallToAction: Ready to transform your digital presence?
servicesTitle: The Perfect Plan to Reach Your Goal
servicesSubTitle:
Two clear paths to success.
Are you looking for quick results or to build a solid brand?

landingPages.title: Launch Plan
landingPages.description: The ideal solution to start attracting clients from day one. We deliver a high-conversion Landing Page, optimized for your advertising campaigns, with technical maintenance included for 3 months.

sitiosWeb.title: Authority Plan
sitiosWeb.description: Build a solid brand that generates trust and positions you as an expert. We create a complete Institutional Website that showcases your experience and services, with initial SEO optimization so your clients can find you on Google.

pricing.pricingTitle: From Idea to Launch in 3 Clear Steps
pricing.pricingSubtitle: A simple, transparent, and you-focused process.

basic.name: Diagnosis and Strategy
basic.description: We don't start designing without a plan. The first phase is an in-depth conversation to understand your goals, your ideal client, and your challenges. We come out of this with a clear strategy and an action plan for your project.

professional.name: Design and Construction
professional.description: This is where the strategy becomes a reality. Our team designs an engaging user experience and builds your website with cutting-edge technology, keeping you updated on the progress so you can see your vision take shape.

enterprise.name: Launch and Support
enterprise.description: We don't just hand over the files and disappear. We officially launch your website, ensure everything works perfectly, and provide you with simple training so you understand it. From here, our support begins.

testimonials.quote: Thanks to the work done, we successfully established our presence in the digital world, connecting with more clients and expanding our online reach.
testimonials.author: Dataholics
testimonials.plan: Launch Plan: Lead Capture Landing Page

testimonials.quote: I wanted something simple yet professional to showcase my business and the services I offer. The result exceeded my expectations and gave me a solid foundation to grow.
testimonials.author: Boschetti Bordoni

testimonials.quote: We wanted to give our website a new look: more minimalist, clean, and modern. Not only did we achieve that goal, but we also got a powerful tool for customers to leave their contact information. It has been incredibly useful for us.
testimonials.author: FanPro
testimonials.plan: Launch Plan: Dual Channel Landing Page

contact.title: Ready to Get Started? Let's Talk.
contact.subtitle: Complete the following form and our team will contact you in less than 24 hours to schedule your free, no-obligation consultation.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Hello, I am interested in your services. My project is about... and my main goal is...
contact.alertMessage: Message sent! We will get in touch with you as soon as possible.
